reviewText: I didn't find it useful but only because my child already knew more then half of the tricks(but that's my fault for buying it).

The video shows lots, and I do mean LOTS, of tricks. It's just in a bizarre, menu-driven format that is a bit tough for my 10-year old yo-yo enthusiast to watch. I think a lesson-based, skill-building format would be better. But hey, I don't make yo-yo videos...

while this dvd did showcase a lot of tricks, they were all very similar and not challenging to someone with yoyo experience.  my nephew zipped right to the advanced trick section which was very small, and breezed thru it.  meaning he didn't learn anything new.  for a rank beginner this dvd is fine.
